title: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with many projects, the checkboxes are not updated using a busy cursor.
EB: The checkboxes should be updated using a busy cursor when exporting a Zip file in a workspace with many projects.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:1. Open a workspace with many projects.2. Click on the export Zip option.3. Select all projects.4. Choose some file types.5. Click on the 'Ok' button.
